projectGridLines.title: Title: IoT-Based Smart Monitoring and Control Systems
projectGridLines.description:
Title: IoT-Based Smart Monitoring and Control Systems

Description: Develop an IoT system to monitor and control devices or environments remotely using sensor data.

Skill sets:  IoT architecture, microcontroller programming, sensor integration, wireless communication, cloud platform integration

Traits expectation: Curiosity, troubleshooting skills, innovation, adaptability

Expected learning: End-to-end IoT solution design, real-time data processing, cloud integration.

Specific courses required for project execution:  IoT Systems Design, Embedded Systems, Cloud Computing, Wireless Communication Protocols.

Title: Machine Learning for Predictive Analytics

Description: Build predictive models using machine learning techniques to solve real-world problems such as forecasting and classification.

Skill sets:Machine learning algorithms, data preprocessing, Python/R, model evaluation, time-series data analysis.

Traits expectation: Analytical mindset, problem-solving, persistence in model optimization, data handling skills.

Expected learning: Application of ML techniques, model optimization, handling large datasets

Specific courses required for project execution: Machine Learning, Data Science, Python for ML, Advanced ML Algorithms.

Title: Software Development Lifecycle Implementation

Description: Work on a software development project, covering all phases of SDLC from requirements gathering to deployment.

Skill sets: Programming (Python, Java, JavaScript), front-end and back-end development, database management, version control.

Traits expectation: Problem-solving, scalable architecture thinking, attention to security, teamwork.

Expected learning: End-to-end software development, Agile, DevOps, coding best practices.

Specific courses required for project execution:  Full Stack Development, Database Design, Software Engineering, Agile and DevOps.

Title: Data Analytics for Business Intelligence

Description: Analyze data to generate actionable insights for business decisions, using statistical models and visualization tools.

Skill sets: Data preprocessing, visualization (Tableau, Power BI), SQL, statistical analysis, Python/R for data manipulation.

Traits expectation:  Attention to detail, data interpretation, communication skills, analytical thinking

Expected learning: Data analysis, visualization, dashboard creation, predictive and prescriptive analytics.

Specific courses required for project execution:  Data Analytics, SQL, Statistics, Python for Data Science.

Title: IoT and Machine Learning Integration for Smart Applications

Description: Integrate IoT and machine learning to create smart systems for predictive maintenance or real-time monitoring.

Skill sets: IoT system design, data transmission, machine learning model development, cloud storage, Python for IoT and ML integration.

Traits expectation: Innovation, logical reasoning, troubleshooting, adaptability.

Expected learning: IoT-ML integration, real-time data processing, deployment on edge devices.

Specific courses required for project execution:  IoT and Cloud Computing, ML Algorithms, Python for IoT, Data Processing in IoT.
